title: Did we get any information of the plans for Xin Xhaos VGU

replies.body: We haven't mentioned much yet. It's not going to be a VGU though, but a smaller, primarily gameplay focusd update. Think similar to the changes Rek'Sai got earlier in the year for example.
Is there key ability that will be changed? Like R of (heh) Rek'sai? Or just like: small update W, bigger R etc. ?
His W will be completely reworked
